forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 2pm. Mostly sunny. High near 86, with temperatures falling to around 84 in the afternoon. Southeast wind around 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 68. South southeast wind 2 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 8am and 2pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 87. South southwest wind 2 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 70. South wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: This Afternoon

forecast.name: Tonight

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
